results.content: Too too too basic for an intermediate course. Almost nothing learnt.
results.content_html: Too too too basic for an intermediate course. Almost nothing learnt.

results.content:
too basic for an intermediate level course
also had errors in the first exercise for not capturing the error in JS when you didn't guess the right year
finally too much repetitive info or watching you type out intents and JSON examples by hand.
This is a basic course at best and I am disappointed because I was expecting more based on the other reviews.

results.content: How is this an intermediate course? far far too simple. I have no experience with Alexa skills and yet he has still not taught me anything new. I am 60 mins into this course and he is teaching the viewer basic coding such as variables. he has not even started on Alexa skills yet. Colossal waste of money. I am feeling very ripped off.

results.content: Great, explanations and detailed descriptions. I especially like the test questions at the end.
